isHidden.description: sets visibility:hidden to the component style node

alignment.description: The alignment of the content relative to the whole column, represented as percentage (e.g. 0 for left, 50 for center and 100 for right)

required.description: is the input field required to have a value

autoFocus.description: should the field be focused when loading the page

tabIndex.description: the tab index in the form

imageSize.description: size of the image in runtime

transparentBg.description: Sets a transparent background for the like box

placeholder.description: The placeholder for the input skinpart

newItemText.description: The text that will appear on a new item in the dropdown

maxTextLength.description: The max text length for the input skinpart

originalHeight.description: Used to determine if comp was saved with correct height (if value not empty), or height needs to be fixed in DataFixer (if value is empty)

layout.description: the layout of the youtube subscribe button

theme.description: the theme of the youtube subscribe button

value.description: the value of the placeholder option

text.description: the text of the placeholder option

placeholder.description: the placeholder option in case nothing is selected

layout.description: the layout of the radio buttons child components

spacing.description: Spacing between radio icon and text

alignText.description: alignment of the menu buttons' text

moreItemHeight.description: height of items in the more menu

rtl.description: should display menu in RTL mode

transDuration.description: Duration of the transition in sec
Duration of the transition in sec

openIn.description: Where the link will be opened

transDuration.description: Duration of the transition in sec

fixedPosition.description: fixed positioning for components that inherit from SiteSegmentContainers

transition.description: Transition between items of the gallery

transDuration.description: Duration of the transition in sec

bidirectional.description: Decides whether the transition direction reflects Prev/Next

reverse.description: If bidirectional, inverts the direction of transitions

numPosts.description: the number of posts display by default

width.description: the width of the plugin, in pixels

colorScheme.description: the color scheme of the plugin

canBeShownOnAllPagesBug.description: The component was added after the bug who-145 fix, and will be shown on all pages

show_faces.description: show the faces of your friends that liked this item

width.description: the width of the Like button

action.description: the verb to display on the button. Options: *like*, *recommend*

font.description: the font to display in the button

colorScheme.description: the color scheme for the like button

annotation.description: The annotation to display next to the button.

width.description: If annotation is set to *inline*, the width in pixels to use for the button and its inline annotation. If omitted, a button and its inline annotation use 450px.

effectName.description: An effect to apply on the image

textColor.description: HEX color code for the text color

linkColor.description: HEX color code for the Username link color

dataLang.description: The language for the Tweet Button (from https://dev.twitter.com/overview/general/adding-international-support-to-your-apps)
The language for the Tweet Button (from https://dev.twitter.com/overview/general/adding-international-support-to-your-apps)

mobileDisplayedModeId.description: The mode to activate when in mobile view

numOfHoles.description: number of holes in the honeycomb

transition.description: Transition between items of the gallery

transDuration.description: Duration of the transition in sec

navigationButtonSize.description: Size of the navigation arrow buttons

navigationButtonMargin.description: Margin from the sides of the navigation arrow buttons

navigationDotsMargin.description: Margin from the sides of the navigation dots

navigationDotsGap.description: Gap size (spacing) of the navigation dots

navigationButtonMargin.description: Margin from the sides of the navigation arrow buttons

navigationDotsMargin.description: Margin from the sides of the navigation dots

navigationDotsGap.description: Gap size (spacing) of the navigation dots

autoColor.description: does the menu color change automatically according to the background brightness

placeholder.description: the placeholder option in case nothing is selected

oneOf.description: the type of the default text for the input

autoComplete.description: can the field be auto completed by the browser

placeholder.description: the placeholder option in case nothing is selected

oneOf.description: the type of the default text for the input

textPadding.description: the value of the text padding

placeholder.description: placeholder text for date in input field

dateFormat.description: date format for selected date presentation inside the date input field

defaultTextType.description: the type of the default text for the date input
